item.description: Happy Birthday America! What could be more FUN than celebrating our patriotism along with our Favorite Pooches! Join us this Sunday July 15th from 11:00am to 1:00pm. We'll have bobbing for kongs, Hula Hoop Jumping, a Tunnel Race and much more! We can't wait to see everyone again to catch up on how your summer is going. Inside & Outside play available weather permitting! Special Treat for Dogs Dressed In Patriotic Colors!
item.name: Patriotic Pet Play Date
